p: Hence, in cooperation with the great efforts and health care given by the Saudi government represented in the Ministry of Health in terms of health, field, digital, and community services and efforts to decrease the spread of the COVID‚Äê19 and frame its scope. This study comes from an academic research team at Princess Nourah Bint Abdul Rahman University as a contribution to its educational role and the community to raise the level of positive perceptions and awareness of health, values and ethics to deal with the Corona virus among university teachers staff.
